title: Aleene's15594 Leather & Suede Glue 4oz
description: Aleene’s Leather & Suede Glue is your go-to glue for embellishing leather and suede projects! This nontoxic fast-tacking glue dries clear and flexible, and won’t soak through or stain leathers and suedes. Use it for light repairs or adding embellishments such as fringes, beadwork, and other fabrics to your leather projects. Not intended for heavy duty repairs or areas that endure a lot of wear and tear.
